title: Glencore Acquires Majority Stake In Dutch Fuel Supplier
summary: Global commodities trader Glencore has acquired a majority stake in Dutch fuel supplier FincoEnergies, the Dutch company revealed on Monday, with industry sources noting that the trader intends to use the acquisition to expand its Northwest European footprint in fuel markets. title: China Condemns U.S. Seizing Venezuela Oil Tankers
summary: China on Monday slammed the intensifying U.S. pressure on Venezuela and the seizure of Venezuela-linked oil tankers, saying that the unilateral U.S. moves violate international law. “The US practice of arbitrarily seizing other countries’ vessels grossly violates international law,” Chinese Foreign…

title: Africa Needs $100 Billion in Refining Investment as Oil Demand Soars
summary: Africa’s crude oil demand is set to more than double to 4.5 million barrels per day (bpd) by 2050, which will need more than $100 billion in investment in refining over the next decades, according to the African Refiners and Distributors Association (ARDA). summary: Oil and gas producer Indonesia has put up for tender eight new blocks to award to companies as Southeast Asia’s biggest economy looks to boost domestic hydrocarbon reserves and production. title: Russian LNG Exports to China Break Record
summary: Russian liquefied natural gas exports to China broke a record set earlier this year, overtaking Australian shipments in November, according to customs data cited by Bloomberg.
